heading.value: Nine online degrees — one prestigious community

introduction.value: The University of London offers nine online undergraduate degrees in disciplines like economics, data science, business and management, finance and accounting, and international relations. Each online programme is designed and led by academics with years of industry experience, and each programme offers its learners the practical skills they need to accomplish their unique career goals.

header.value: BSc Data Science and Business Analytics

description.value: Passionate about solving real-world problems with data insights? The online BSc Data Science and Business Analytics programme can help you leverage new statistical models to make your mark in these evolving fields.

Interested in the processes, procedures, and practices needed to manage some of the world's leading organizations? The online BSc Business and Management programme will provide you with the strategic thinking and decision-making skills you need to succeed.

title: Master of Science in Applied Data Science
secondary_description: The online Master of Science in Applied Data Science program meets the same high academic standards of Syracuse University’s on-campus program. The curriculum is 34 credits and can be completed in as few as 18 months. Designed to provide you with critical thinking and problem-solving skills. No GRE required.
subject: Data Analysis & Statistics

contentful_fields.page_title: Syracuse University MS in Applied Data Science online
contentful_fields.subheading: Learn to develop data-driven solutions to solve business challenges and make a measurable impact in your organization with the Orange community.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction:
The online MS in Applied Data Science curriculum combines methodologies and practices from the fields of information science and business. The curriculum was developed in collaboration with the Whitman School of Management; learners engage in a unique experience that explores the impact data science has on business. 

Choose between three tracks to specialize your degree and reach your professional goals:

product_list.description: Delve deeper into the business applications of data science.
Focus on unstructured language data.
Explore data collection and data engineering.

title: Master of Information and Cybersecurity
secondary_description: Through the UC Berkeley School of Information’s online Master of Information and Cybersecurity (MICS) program’s holistic approach, experienced professionals become well-rounded, sought-after cybersecurity leaders. Located in the Bay Area’s renowned technology hub, the MICS program exposes its students to extensive networking opportunities with alumni and cybersecurity professionals. The program includes in-person immersion experiences, and the degree can be completed in 20 months. No GRE/GMAT required to apply.
subject: Computer Science

contentful_fields.page_title: UC Berkeley Master’s in Cybersecurity online
contentful_fields.subheading: The online Master of Information and Cybersecurity (MICS) program prepares leaders to drive the future of cybersecurity solutions across industries.

featured_products.heading: Featured courses
featured_products.introduction:
The interdisciplinary cybersecurity@berkeley curriculum offers hands-on practical experience with secure systems and applications, and equips learners with the ability to lead, manage, and contribute to building cybersecurity solutions. Learners graduate with a comprehensive understanding of the technical, political, business, legal, and ethical components of cybersecurity. 

Below are three featured courses in the program:

product_list.header: Cryptography for Cyber and Network Security
product_list.description: Learn about the mathematical and practical foundations of cryptography and the many different cryptosystems.
Compare approaches to security taken among several modern operating systems, and learn techniques for establishing trust across a set of interoperating systems.
Survey privacy mechanisms applicable to systems engineering, focusing on the inference threat that may arise due to advancements in artificial intelligence and machine learning.

title: Master of Information and Data Science
secondary_description: The No.2-ranked master of information and data science (MIDS) delivered online from the UC Berkeley School of Information (I School) is for professionals looking to become leaders in the field of data science.1 The program features a multidisciplinary approach to the data life cycle, from planning and gathering data to analyzing and presenting findings. Coursework examines issues of privacy, explores machine learning, and considers techniques of data storage and management.
subject: Data Analysis & Statistics

contentful_fields.page_title: UC Berkeley’s Master of Information and Data Science (MIDS) online
contentful_fields.subheading: UC Berkeley’s online Master of Information and Data Science program prepares learners to become data-driven leaders.

featured_products.heading: Featured courses
featured_products.introduction: Designed to develop forward-thinking leaders in data science, the MIDS program features a multidisciplinary curriculum that prepares you to become a decision-maker with a comprehensive understanding of how to derive insights from real-world data sets. Courses focused on programming, such as those featured below, are completed alongside courses that explore the ethical impact of data science and how to effectively communicate results.

product_list.description: Learn how to apply crucial machine learning techniques to solve problems, run evaluations, and interpret results, and understand scaling up from thousands of data points to billions.

product_list.header: Behind the Data: Humans and Values
product_list.description: Examine the legal, policy, and ethical issues that arise throughout the full life cycle of data science. Case studies will be used to explore these issues across various domains such as criminal justice, national security, health, marketing, politics, education, and employment.

product_list.header: Natural Language Processing with Deep Learning
product_list.description: Gain a broad introduction to linguistic phenomena and our attempts to analyze them with machine learning. We cover a wide range of concepts, with a focus on practical applications such as information extraction, machine translation, sentiment analysis, and summarization.

title: Master of Public Health
partner: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
secondary_description: Earn your Master of Public Health (MPH) from UNC-Chapel Hill's Gillings School of Global Public Health in as few as 16–20 months. The CEPH-accredited online learning experience offers four concentrations: MPH Leadership, MPH Nutrition, Applied Epidemiology and MPH/Registered Dietitian (MPH/RD). No GRE required.
subject: Health & Safety
organization_short_code_override: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

owners.name: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill

contentful_fields.page_title: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill Master of Public Health online
contentful_fields.subheading: Prepare to anticipate and combat today’s most urgent public health challenges.

featured_products.heading: Program tracks
featured_products.introduction: The 42-credit online Master of Public Health program offers an interdisciplinary understanding of the cultural, environmental, and social issues that create inequalities in modern-day society. No matter which track you choose, you’ll graduate prepared to lead sustainable change and create a more equitable world. Learners can choose from three track options:

product_list.description: Lead teams, projects, and organizations in eliminating health disparities, improving individual well-being, and fostering change in local and global communities. You’ll learn how to develop practical solutions to systemic challenges in any area of public health. Complete in as few as 20–24 months.

Improve the health of individuals, families, and communities through nutrition outreach, policy, and education. In addition to core public health knowledge, you’ll focus on nutrition science, behavior change, counseling, and the broad effects of dietary culture. Complete in as few as 16 months.

Use data to improve population health in the UNC Gillings School’s Applied Epidemiology concentration for the online MPH program. You’ll learn to understand public health surveillance systems, recommend study designs, conduct analyzes to address research questions, and communicate findings to a variety of audiences. Complete in as few as 20–24 months.

title: Master of Public Health
secondary_description: Founded in 1997, the Milken Institute School of Public Health at the George Washington University is dedicated to empowering underserved populations and advancing the health of communities around the globe. Our live, online classes feature a 15:1 student-to-faculty ratio, enabling you to form close connections with your peers and GW faculty in an engaging learning environment. Earn your MPH in as few as 12 months and make a meaningful difference in public health — without having to relocate — with MPH@GW. No GRE required.
subject: Health & Safety

contentful_fields.page_title: George Washington University Master of Public Health (MPH) online
contentful_fields.subheading:
Gain the skills to transform healthcare on a local, national, or international scale with the George Washington University (GW).

MPH@GW is offering a tuition scholarship of up to $15,000 to students who are accepted and enrolled into the upcoming cohort.

featured_products.heading: Concentrations
featured_products.introduction: As a learner, you can choose your own elective courses or select an optional concentration. No matter which path you pursue, the curriculum is composed of 45 credits. The following concentrations are available:

product_list.description: Develop the skills, knowledge, and values you will need to effectively address the planet’s most urgent health issues.
Unpack and address the social, behavioral, and systems-based factors that uniquely affect women, children, adolescents, and families.
Leverage information technology, data, and analytics to enhance clinical and healthcare-centered processes, services, and research.
Learn to assess and mitigate the public health issues linked to anthropogenic climate change, with a systems approach and multidisciplinary approach.

title: Master of Science in Marriage and Family Therapy
secondary_description: MFT@Northwestern is a Master of Science in Marriage and Family Therapy program offered by The Family Institute, combining online learning with innovative therapeutic methods and in-person clinical experiences. Aspiring therapists are encouraged to consider relationships, the larger system, and social justice, applying a multicultural lens as they develop client treatment plans.
subject: Social Sciences

contentful_fields.page_title: Northwestern University Master of Science in Marriage and Family Therapy (MFT) online
contentful_fields.subheading: Help families and couples from diverse backgrounds strengthen and heal their relationships as a Northwestern-trained marriage and family therapist.

featured_products.heading: Featured courses
featured_products.introduction: The 26-credit online MFT curriculum focuses on the Integrative Systemic Therapy (IST) approach developed by renowned Northwestern faculty. IST aims to systematically address client concerns from a relational and larger systemic perspective. As a learner in the online program, you will attend live, online class sessions, learn from qualified instructors with therapeutic experience, and gain hands-on training during immersive clinical experiences. You will graduate prepared to address complex issues and develop therapy plans to strengthen and heal families and couples from all walks of life. Featured courses include:

product_list.description: Learn the central theoretical underpinnings of systemic family therapy, using a basic framework for assessment of and intervention in the issues clients bring to therapy.

Study the Integrative Systemic Therapy (IST) approach for working with couples, which involves a focus on sequences of interaction, affective intensity, and subtlety of communication. Learn theoretical models, case conceptualization, and intervention from a cultural perspective by considering the social positioning of both the client(s) and the therapist.

product_list.header: Family Therapy with Children and Adolescents
product_list.description: Develop the practical skills necessary to work with families, children, and adolescents. Learn to consider the intersections of development and sociocultural systems as part of the assessment and intervention process.

product_list.header: Power, Privilege, and Difference — Practicing Cultural Curiosity and Humility in a Multicultural World
product_list.description: Gain insight into the influence of race, class, culture, ethnicity, gender, gender identity, sexuality, religion, nationality, and ability in the practice of marriage and family therapy. Uncover the assumptions, values, and beliefs about yourself and others as a means of working more effectively with diverse populations in the therapeutic process.

title: Master of Health Administration
secondary_description: Earn your Master of Health Administration (MHA) 100% online from MGH Institute of Health Professions, the only degree-granting affiliate of Mass General Brigham. You will gain inclusive leadership skills, an interprofessional network and expert mentorship from Mass General Brigham faculty as you prepare to drive transformative, equitable change within healthcare.

contentful_fields.page_title: MGH Institute of Health Professions Master of Health Administration online
contentful_fields.subheading: Earn your Master of Health Administration (MHA) 100% online from MGH Institute of Health Professions, the only degree-granting affiliate of Mass General Brigham. You will gain inclusive leadership skills, an interprofessional network and expert mentorship from Mass General Brigham faculty as you prepare to drive transformative, equitable change within healthcare.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction: The online Master of Health Administration program is designed to provide current and aspiring healthcare administrators with the essential skills and knowledge required for successful leadership in the complex and dynamic healthcare industry. As a student, you will be equipped to lead financially sustainable healthcare organizations that deliver high-quality care, and maintain compliance with legal and ethical standards. The MHA’s comprehensive 36-credit curriculum covers six key areas of study that will result in a well-rounded skill set in advanced healthcare leadership and management. Some of those key areas include:

product_list.header: Management functions and skills for healthcare leaders
product_list.description: Develop business and marketing strategies to position your organization, attract patients and respond to market demands while maintaining quality care.
Learn how you can create a positive organizational culture and drive performance improvements.
Monitor and improve healthcare outcomes while considering the needs of diverse patient populations.
Ensure that healthcare services are accessible and culturally competent for all patient populations.

secondary_description:
Throughout the program you’ll:

Explore emerging trends and technologies: Gain new insights that demonstrate your forward-thinking aptitude and maximize your career potential. 

Participate in real-life projects: Explore current and future applications of artificial intelligence that mimic data challenges across various industries.

title: Master of Science Strategic Marketing
primary_description: Whatever marketing specialism you aspire to, our MSc Strategic Marketing aims to equip you with the fundamental concepts, models, digital tools and processes that are necessary for gaining sustainable competitive advantage.
secondary_description:
Creative, client-facing, analytical, practical or more: whatever marketing specialism you aspire to, our MSc Strategic Marketing aims to equip you with the fundamental concepts, models, digital tools and processes that are necessary for gaining sustainable competitive advantage in the marketplace.

You'll gain comprehensive strategic, digital marketing and social media knowledge and skills, which will give you advanced understanding of contemporary marketing principles. Digital and strategic marketing skills are vital for marketing in a data-driven world, and this course will give you the knowledge and skills you need to make informed marketing decisions in today’s dynamic marketing world. You will develop as an agile and entrepreneurial marketing professional and will be an asset for future employers.

As an MSc student of Strategic Marketing, you’ll be based in Surrey Business School and be part of a vibrant community focused on improving business practice and creating a sustainable and positive change.

At Surrey Business School, we emphasise innovation and leadership, and provide an in-depth and hands-on approach to teaching. Our MSc Strategic Marketing builds on the established research strengths and teaching capabilities of the Department of Marketing which will equip you with the attributes, ways of thinking and behaviour of a contemporary marketing professional.

Students will learn advanced analytics techniques adopted by the leading organisations to assess and manage customer service experience.

We’ll bring out your creativity and problem-solving abilities and develop your skills as a successful marketer. We’ll teach you the ‘ins’ and ‘outs’ of marketing strategies, processes and techniques. You’ll also learn about communication, digital and social media marketing, marketing research, and customer-facing functions.

You’ll study a range of core concepts from other management disciplines, including innovation management. You can tailor our course to suit your career aspirations by choosing from distinctive optional modules, covering different topics such as global strategy, marketing analytics and more.

contentful_fields.page_title: University of Surrey MSc Strategic Marketing online
contentful_fields.subheading: Learn how to apply data-driven, creative marketing strategies that will help you lead your organization into a successful future.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction: The online MSc Strategic Marketing will equip you with an advanced knowledge and understanding of contemporary marketing principles, digital marketing fundamentals, and marketing analytics. This course is designed for students with any level of background in marketing, whether you’re new to the field or already have years of professional experience. As a student in the course, you will:

product_list.description: Become proficient in social media marketing and digital marketing communications.
Develop confidence, adaptability, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities.
Get insight into the theoretical concepts of sustainable marketing and their application to real marketing cases.

Supplement your master’s with professional marketing qualifications. Surrey’s online MSc course is a CIM Accredited Degree , which means you can earn CIM qualifications in less time — you'll only need to take one assessment instead of three. There is a fee to join CIM.

introduction.value: The online MSc Strategic Marketing will equip you with an advanced knowledge and understanding of contemporary marketing principles, digital marketing fundamentals, and marketing analytics. This course is designed for students with any level of background in marketing, whether you’re new to the field or already have years of professional experience. As a student in the course, you will:

description.value: Become proficient in social media marketing and digital marketing communications.
Develop confidence, adaptability, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities.
Get insight into the theoretical concepts of sustainable marketing and their application to real marketing cases.

Supplement your master’s with professional marketing qualifications. Surrey’s online MSc course is a CIM Accredited Degree , which means you can earn CIM qualifications in less time — you'll only need to take one assessment instead of three. There is a fee to join CIM.

title: Master of Architecture (M.Arch.)
secondary_description: RIT architecture online is one of the first master of architecture programs to be offered online in the United States. In the program, you will learn to design high-performance, sustainable buildings that speak to site, climate, context, and user needs. RIT also offers an on-campus pathway.
subject: Architecture

contentful_fields.page_title: Rochester Institute of Technology (RIT) Master of Architecture (M.Arch.) online
contentful_fields.subheading: Develop the practical skills and creativity to design innovative, sustainable buildings that meet the needs of modern communities. Earn your M.Arch. from RIT’s Golisano Institute for Sustainability.

featured_products.heading: Program tracks
featured_products.introduction:
RIT’s online Master of Architecture is offered through Golisano Institute for Sustainability. Learners develop the scientific and technical skills and knowledge they need to design energy efficient buildings that use environmentally-friendly materials, and require less land development. Learners complete online coursework and participate in hands-on studio time. The online M.Arch. program focuses on four core areas: sustainability, technology, urbanism, and integrated learning and practice.

Learners can choose between two plans of study:

product_list.description: This program is for learners with little or no background in architecture, is made up of 90 credits, and takes 36 months to complete, full time. It covers foundational knowledge, offers electives perfect for honing skills, provides practical experience, and concludes with a thesis.

This program is for learners with a bachelor’s degree related to architecture, is made up of 63 credits, and takes 24 months to complete, full time. Instead of foundational courses, it offers subjects such as integrated building systems, urban planning, and industrial ecology.

title: Master of Business Administration
secondary_description: GMAT waivers are available for the online MBA from Rice Business. Earn your MBA in as few as 24 months and develop your understanding of essential business principles such as financial accounting, business analytics, marketing, leadership and finance.
subject: Business & Management

contentful_fields.page_title: Rice Business at Rice University MBA online
contentful_fields.subheading: Rice Business’s online MBA program teaches learners how to solve complicated business problems, pursue innovation fearlessly, and grow bold ideas.

featured_products.heading: Focus areas
featured_products.introduction:
A learner’s first year consists of core courses, while their second year includes both core courses and elective courses. Learners must finish 54 credits and can complete the program in as little as 24 months. Upon graduation, learners earn a Master’s of Business Administration degree. 

The MBA@Rice program offers both full- and part-time courses to help learners achieve their goals as they simultaneously navigate their unique professional and personal obligations. The full-time courses are worth 3 credits and take place over 10 weeks; the part-time courses are worth 1.5 credits and last 5 weeks.

Learners have the flexibility to focus on electives and to choose a specialization during their second year, with 13.5 elective credits. Learners are able to customize their program to their own interests thanks to seven focus areas available to them, or choose to stay with general management.

The seven areas of focus include:

product_list.description: Devise strategies that help the bottom-line and provide a competitive advantage.
Hone financial analysis and broaden your managerial skills.
Gain knowledge invaluable for mastering derivative securities and portfolio management.
Learn quantitative skills and frameworks to understand and discover consumer insights.
Delve further into entrepreneurial skills through learning in the Entrepreneurship Lab.
Master the management and entrepreneurial skills you need as the energy industry continues evolving.
Complement general business management courses with the skills you need to drive change in the healthcare industry.

title: Post-Baccalaureate Certificate in Project Management
secondary_description:
Gain industry-relevant skills: Compare and contrast various project management methodologies and techniques and select appropriate methods to complete projects efficiently.
Chart your career path: After completing the program, you’ll be prepared to work in roles such as project manager, operations manager, consultant, HR project manager, talent development manager, brand manager, digital marketing manager, procurement manager, and more.
Start classes on your schedule: Choose when you want to start with enrollment options for the fall, spring, or summer.

contentful_fields.page_title: Maryville University Post-Baccalaureate Certificate in Project Management online
contentful_fields.subheading: Develop leadership and communication skills through courses that feature hands-on project management work and are aligned to the educational requirements for the PMP® Certification Exam.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction: This 12-credit program places an emphasis on practical, hands-on learning with case studies and real-world scenarios to help you be prepared to tackle complex projects and lead diverse teams across diverse industries and organizations. You’ll explore cutting-edge project management methodologies, strategic budgeting, risk management, and resource allocation, ensuring you can tackle any project on time and within budget. All courses within this certificate program count toward the Master of Arts in Management and Leadership degree and are designed to prepare you to sit for the PMP® Certification Exam. Throughout the program you’ll:

product_list.header: Strengthen your leadership and communication skills
product_list.description: Enhance your ability to lead, motivate, and effectively engage with teams, stakeholders, and sponsors.
Explore various project management methodologies and techniques, and select appropriate methods to complete projects efficiently.
Cover essential project management skills that are highly valued across various industries and functional areas, opening opportunities for career growth and higher-level positions.
Build a foundation of professionalism to stand out as a trustworthy and reliable project manager in any professional setting.

title: Master of Science in Data Science
primary_description: LEAD THE WORLD IN BUSINESS ANALYTICS TO PRODUCE SOLUTIONS AND CHANGE HOW ORGANIZATIONS FUNCTION
secondary_description:
In today's dynamic business landscape, data-driven decision-making is key. That's why we've designed a skills-based learning program that not only equips you with the latest analytics tools and techniques but also connects you with industry micro-credentials that are in high demand.
Become a data analyst ready to analyze and to visualize data for strategic decision making 
Study contemporary data analyst skills from content derived from leading, global organizations
Study consumers’ buying habits to help businesses make more strategic decisions about how they market their products and services. 
Master the process of gleaning insights from data to inform better business decisions
Learn in-demand job skills from first day of instruction and bring them into the workplace
The Masters of Science in Business Analytics is designed to prepare learners for data analyst careers.  A data analyst finds a solution to a problem or provides an answer to a question.  This career tasks a data analyst to gather, purify, and analyze data sets.  Contemporary data analysts work in a variety of fields, including government, business, finance, law enforcement, and science.

contentful_fields.page_title: Hawai‘i Pacific University Master of Science in Data Science online
contentful_fields.subheading:
The online MS in Data Science program from Hawai‘i Pacific University prepares students to interpret both conventional and unconventional data, strengthen their creative problem-solving skills, and apply cutting-edge data analysis expertise to nearly every industry. 

Students are brought into the modern era of data analytics through a curriculum that examines AI and machine learning, big data analytics, high-performance computing, cloud computing, and more.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction: The curriculum combines traditional data analysis with computer programming to ensure that graduates are equipped with the skills they will need to thrive in an evolving industry. Topics include AI/machine learning, big data analytics, high-performance computing, and cloud computing. The skills students acquire during the program can help open doors to diverse and lucrative employment opportunities in finance, technology, and sciences.

product_list.description: The curriculum consists of 10 courses, and a capstone designed to strengthen your data science portfolio.
Review foundational skills in statistics, programming, computing, and linear algebra. These prerequisites are highly recommended.
Distinguish learning problems, select machine learning and deep learning models, and implement a training algorithm.
Apply a framework to evaluate ethical issues in artificial intelligence and data science.

title: Master of Legal Studies
secondary_description: Pepperdine Caruso Law’s online Master of Legal Studies program is designed for professionals across industries who would benefit from understanding legal procedures and concepts but do not plan to become lawyers. No GRE/LSAT scores are required. Bachelor’s degree required.
subject: Law

contentful_fields.page_title: Pepperdine University Master of Legal Studies (MLS) online
contentful_fields.subheading: Develop superior legal expertise as a nonlawyer, with Pepperdine Caruso School of Law’s online Master of Legal Studies program.

featured_products.heading: Flexibility — choose your concentration
featured_products.introduction:
Pepperdine’s curriculum allows learners the options of specific concentrations, or to generalize their studies.

The program offers the following concentrations:

product_list.description: Learners can gain a broad understanding of legal concepts regarding business, education, advocacy and healthcare.
Learners hone their focus and gain skills in arbitration and conflict mediation.

Learners explore the fundamental legal principles of human resources and, by completing specialized coursework, master salary negotiation, hiring and termination, and noncompetition and confidentiality agreements.

Learners study litigation-specific coursework and build the required expertise they need to stand out in their industry in occupations such as as compliance officers, paralegals, legal assistants, nonprofit employees, and managers.

title: Master of Studies in Law in Corporate Compliance
secondary_description: In as few as 12 months, learn to advocate for integrity at your organization with a flexible, online M.S.L. in Corporate Compliance from Fordham Law School. No GRE or LSAT required. Choose a program track—general, human resources, financial services, or health care—to gain industry-specific knowledge.
subject: Law

contentful_fields.page_title: Fordham University Master of Studies in Law (MSL) in Corporate Compliance online
contentful_fields.subheading: Learn to evaluate and fortify your organization’s compliance practices as a non-lawyer professional with the Fordham School of Law.

featured_products.heading: Featured courses
featured_products.introduction:
The online Master of Studies in Law (MSL) in Corporate Compliance prepares learners to develop effective compliance solutions, and stand out as expert non-lawyer professionals. This immersive program — designed for working professionals — can be completed in as few as 12 months and entirely online. No post-graduate work experience is required to apply. 

Learners can further specialize their learning with optional concentrations. Choose from four tracks to focus your degree:

product_list.description: Learn to operationalize compliance to uphold fiduciary duties and combat financial crimes, including money laundering and bribery.
Develop the tools to manage the array of ethics and compliance risks facing organizations in the healthcare sector.
Strengthen your understanding of employment and human rights, and gain tools needed to manage “conduct” risks, including professional investigations and smart training.
Gain the skills you need to build robust compliance programs in organizations of all types.

title: Master of Data Science (Online)
secondary_description: Offered by the University of Sydney – ranked No.1 for graduate employability in Australia – the online Master of Data Science prepares you to make an impact and lead in the rapidly growing field of data technology. You will benefit from a multidisciplinary, innovative course structure and learn from international experts in AI and machine learning, with the added flexibility of being 100 percent online.
subject: Data Analysis & Statistics

contentful_fields.page_title: University of Sydney Master of Data Science (Online)
contentful_fields.subheading: Earn an online Master of Data Science at the University of Sydney. Drive business decision making, and research outputs by broadening data and leadership skills.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction:
The University of Sydney’s Master of Data Science (Online) is designed to serve the needs — current and future — of a fast-growing field. The program incorporates the latest in data research, all major areas of data science, IT professionalism, and IT and machine learning — all the while fostering collaboration, leadership, and innovation among its learners. 

Full-time learners can complete the program in 18 months, whereas part-time learners can do so in 36. Learners apply their knowledge in a capstone project, solving a problem in their current workplace or further exploring a research topic.

Learners have access to a dedicated support team, as well as access to, and the ability to grow, a powerful network of peers and alumni.

product_list.description: Visual Analytics, Principles of Data Science, Computational Statistical Methods, Professional Practice in IT and Understanding IT Innovations

title: Master of Science in Library and Information Science
secondary_description: In its tradition of preparing students to shape our world through the power of information, Syracuse University’s School of Information Studies (iSchool) offers a Master of Science in Library and Information Science degree delivered online. The program is accredited by the American Library Association and prepares students to help communities better access and understand information and media resources. Students may also specialize in School Media to prepare for library and information roles in elementary and secondary school settings. The program can be completed in 18 months. No GRE scores are required to apply.
subject: Communication

contentful_fields.page_title: Syracuse University MS in Library and Information Science online
contentful_fields.subheading: Gain and leverage technical skills to uplift justice and equity of information as a dedicated community librarian, with the Syracuse University’s School of Information Studies (iSchool).

featured_products.heading: Professional pathways
featured_products.introduction: Librarians provide essential services to connect diverse communities across the globe and protect the freedom of information. MSLIS learners learn to advance equity and promote justice through the lens of technology and access to information, and quickly become exemplary leaders. Align your coursework to your professional goals with one or more of the following professional pathways:

product_list.description: Ensure equal access to library and information services by providing information literacy training, instructions, references, collection management, and outreach to diverse communities.
Master digital data systems, metadata theory and practices, programming and markup languages, and data services, and enrich the life of your community.

product_list.header: Organization and management of information and knowledge
product_list.description: Organize and manage information and knowledge of all types, formats, and forms to achieve your goals and actualize your values.
Facilitate lifelong learning and build relationships with parents, caregivers, and teachers through networking and marketing strategies.
Optimize digital information systems in libraries and other organizations to make data and metadata findable, accessible, interoperable, and usable for daily tasks and operations.
Develop skills and knowledge in research methods and data science to detect emerging market trends or collect critical information to reveal critical insights for your library’s long-term success.

title: Master of Project and Program Management
secondary_description: The online Master of Project and Program Management will equip you with the fundamentals of project management as well as advanced program and portfolio management skills. If you have at least two years of work experience and want to take your career to the next level, this 100 percent online degree is for you. Complete the course in as little as one year full time or in two years part time.
subject: Business & Management

contentful_fields.page_title: University of Sydney Master of Project and Program Management online
contentful_fields.subheading: Gain the skills necessary to be the go-to person to get the job done — in any industry. Earn a Master of Project and Program Management from the University of Sydney, and learn to manage and shepherd all projects to completion, and success.

featured_products.heading: Curriculum
featured_products.introduction: The curriculum is specifically designed to equip learners with the fundamental skills they need to manage projects as well as portfolios. The curriculum also focuses on strategic thinking, effective leadership, and complex program delivery.

product_list.description: Portfolio and Program Management, Strategic Delivery of Change, and Governance and Organisational Project Management.

title: Master of Science in Communications
secondary_description: The world-renowned S.I. Newhouse School of Public Communications at Syracuse University offers an online M.S. in Communications. This program provides students a foundation in communications, digital media, social media and digital journalism with courses taught by the same Newhouse faculty who teach on campus. Students can choose from four specializations: Advertising, Public Relations, Journalism Innovation, and Media Management. Designed for working professionals, the M.S. in Communications features live online classes, dynamic course content and in-person immersion experiences in cities around the world.
subject: Communication

contentful_fields.page_title: Syracuse University Master’s in Communications online
contentful_fields.subheading: Earn an MS in Communications from Syracuse University’s S.I. Newhouse School — a leading communications school with an alumni network of more than 28,000 people.

featured_products.heading: Choose between two degrees
featured_products.introduction:
Would you rather manage a newsroom or create content? To help you leverage emerging media tools and make your mark on the industry based on your unique career goals, the Newhouse School of Public Communications offers its learners two online graduate degrees in communications to choose from: an MS in Communications and an MS in Communications Management. Faculty members are renowned experts in the field, who teach learners in both the in-person and online programs. Both programs focus on the evolving industry, ensuring that learners are up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies.

After earning your degree, you will join the Newhouse Network — a powerful network of more than 28,000 media professionals from a variety of backgrounds. Newhouse alumni work for such companies as Booz Allen Hamilton, Bloomberg News, Hulu, IBM, Lockheed Martin, L’Oréal, Microsoft, and the USA Today Network.

Learners can choose from the following degrees:

product_list.description: Learn to use drone videography, dive into data-driven journalism, and engage your audience with your innovative web and mobile story production skills. The MS in Communication is a part-time program, covers 33 credit hours, and can be completed in as little as 15 months. It also offers three program specializations to choose from: journalism innovation, media management, and strategic communications.

Study a holistic curriculum that blends leadership, business management, and communications courses, and go from experienced professional to industry leader. The MS in Communications Management is a part-time program, covers 36 credit hours, and can be completed in as little as 18 months.
